title: When you play League using your touchpad
body:
... Oh wait that never happens.

... TIME TO RECTIFY THIS SITUATION.

P.S. May Rito have mercy on my teammates these coming 40 minutes.

EDIT: It's k guys. I picked Kat. Crisis averted.

replies.body:
In season five i played with a touch pad

boy do i not miss those days
The batteries have been out for weeks... I'M TIRED OF WAITING.
Lmao get a wired mouse. They're more reliable. I play with a shitty Dell mouse because I trust it

Actually, I just remembered after probably two months of this being dead, the battery is built in, and just needs a USB cable. 

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tj0Zw2Q0wbE/maxresdefault.jpg
